name: Hotel Madrid

reviews.text: This hotel was in a great location. Just a few blocks away from the Spanish Steps and the Spagna Metro station. Rooms were quite accomodating. The only downside is that it can be noisy and not just a little noisy but really noisy. Keep the windows closed and you'll survive.
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great stay at Hotel Madrid. The location is perfect within walking distance of most of the main attractions. The staff was great (all spoke English), very helpful with questions. The room was perfectly clean, a newer bathroom with tub. The rooms were quite large by European standards. The morning breakfast on the top floor sunroom was great, full breakfast, very well presented. There are only two small negatives: 1) the elevator is very small (2 people max), a large person could probably not fit in it. 2) It can be a little noisy at night. Rome is a lively city 24-7, so there are always cars going by, music, people talking loudly, etc. Overall, we would definitely recommend this hotel!
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel in heart of Rome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Madrid is a wonderful clean hotel in the center of Rome. The staff is exceptional, especially Antonio. The maid cleaned our room so well each morning, and the rooftop buffet breakfast was hearty enough to skip lunch. We were able to walk just about everywhere, and close enough to the metro and termini station. The staff was at the desk 24 hours a day, they made reservations for us, called taxis, provided maps, helped us with our Italian, and joked with my husband as he buthcered the language. I will definitely stay there again and again.
reviews.title: Should be 4 stars!!!

likes.disliked: — hairdryer in the bathroom, but hotel management said they are going to replace all

reviews.text: Stayed here with my family between XMAS and New Years in 2007. Overall a wonderful stay, I will list several pros and cons
reviews.title: Great location and good for a family.

description: Situated in a prestigious 16th century building, that belonged to a noble family, the Hotel Madrid in Rome is an elegant three star hotel that enjoys a privileged position: within walking distance from the Spanish Stepsand the Trevi Fountain, the Hotel Madrid is located in the heart of the historical centre of Rome. This hotel is the ideal starting point to visit the monuments of central Rome as well as the most renowned shopping streets.
